name: Hasan Enes

services.title: Review Writing
services.description: We increase the reviews and ratings of your businesses on Google Maps/Google Play Store, and we work towards making them the best in their category in exchange for a fee.

services.title: Software
services.description: We can create software that can further simplify your tasks.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: Article Writing
services.description: We write customized articles for you based on the topic and keywords you provide.

aboutpara:
Hello! My name is Hasan Enes and I'm 17 years old. I'm a senior student in the computer science department of high school, and I always utilize my curiosity for learning new things. Computers and technology have become my passion, and I have a great enthusiasm to develop myself in this field. The world of technology is not only a tool for me but also a platform for exploration. Tracking the latest technologies and advancements, staying up-to-date with trends, and applying them practically bring me great excitement.

One of my strongest skills is teamwork. Collaborating with others, sharing ideas, and achieving common goals motivate me. I value different perspectives and ideas within a team because they make us more creative and innovative. I enjoy working together and believe that by bringing out the strengths of each team member, we can create impressive projects.

In general, for me, every new day is an opportunity to learn, and I strive to constantly improve myself in a world filled with computers. As a computer science student, I'm eager to expand my knowledge and skills further and apply them in real-life situations.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to thousands of people.

experiences.position: Backend Software Developer Intern at Tournate Software
experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a .Net application

education.universityName: Ismet Inonu Vocational and Technical Anatolian High School
